scripts.db:generate: cd packages/db && bunx prisma generate && cd ../..
scripts.dev:db: docker run --name postgres-db -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=mysecretpassword -d -p 5432:5432 postgres && echo 'Waiting for Postgres to be ready...' && until docker exec postgres-db pg_isready -U postgres > /dev/null 2>&1; do sleep 2; done && echo 'âœ… Postgres is ready!' && cd packages/db && bunx prisma migrate dev && bunx prisma generate && cd ../..
